quote: What we think, we become
author: Buddha

quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Thought before word, never word before thought.
author: Suzy Kassem,  Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
author: Plato

quote: A change in thought can change a lot. A change thought can untie and untangle the knot
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: I think to think. Not to be thought-full, or to reach a point of wisdom or acquire a grace of knowledge. I think for the sensuality of thought.
author: Ilyas Kassam

quote: Thoughts Become Things... Choose The Good Ones!
author: Mike Dooley

quote: Old words are reborn with new faces.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: Think, think, think.
author: A.A. Milne,  Winnie-the-Pooh

quote: New day, new hopes, new life!!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Thoughts become things. If you see it in your mind, you will hold it in your hand.
author: Bob Proctor,  You Were Born Rich

quote: Any ideas, plan, or purpose may be placed in the mind through repetition of thought
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: You become what you think about
author: Napoleon Hill,  Success Through A Positive Mental Attitude

quote: Books serve to show a man that those original thoughts of his aren't very new after all.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Thought must be divided against itself before it can come to any knowledge of itself.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: The minute you get a religion you stop thinking. Believe in one thing too much and you have no room for new ideas.
author: Ray Bradbury,  The October Country

quote: The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Which came first, the mind or the idea of the mind? Have you never wondered? They arrived together. The mind is an idea.
author: Bernard Beckett,  Genesis

quote: Whenever I think of something but can't think of what it was I was thinking of, I can't stop thinking until I think I'm thinking of it again. I think I think too much.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: Thought is what we start from: the simple, intimate, immediate datum. Matter is the inferred thing, the mystery.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: An idea is salvation by imagination
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Change your thoughts, change your world.
author: Martha Beck

quote: Change your thoughts to change your reality.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: As we learn, grow and prosper, consciousness takes on new expressions and intrinsically searches for purpose and meaning.
author: Joseph Rain

quote: Don't believe everything you think. Thoughts are just that - thoughts.
author: Allan Lokos,  Pocket Peace: Effective Practices for Enlightened Living

quote: Ideas were found by the freethinker, expressed by poet with the new words,formulated by scholar into knowledge.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: I think, therefore I'll think.
author: Ayn Rand,  Atlas Shrugged: 35th Anniversary Edition

quote: Think before you speak. Read before you think.
author: Fran Lebowitz,  The Fran Lebowitz Reader

quote: Open the window of your mind. Allow the fresh air,new lights and new truths to enter.
author: Amit Ray,  Walking the Path of Compassion

quote: When you think a positive thought, you become positive.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: What is now proved was once only imagined.
author: William Blake

quote: Think big thoughts but relish small pleasures.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.,  Life's Little Instruction Book

quote: Thought is the original source of all wealth, all success, all material gain, all great discoveries and inventions, and of all achievement.
author: Claude M. Bristol

quote: As soon as you have made a thought, laugh at it.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: A person with a new idea is a crank until the idea succeeds.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: The thoughts of all men arise from the darkness. If you are the movement of your soul, and the cause of that movement precedes you, then how could you ever call your thoughts your own? How could you be anything other than a slave to the darkness that comes before?
author: R. Scott Bakker,  The Darkness That Comes Before

quote: The mind creates those things that exist.
author: Terry Tempest Williams,  Pieces of White Shell

quote: Begin to read, write and think.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A thought is a Cosmic Order waiting to happen.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: A man is but the product of his thoughts. What he thinks, he becomes.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Before man ventures into daydreams about his futuristic society, he shouldfirst immerse himself in the nothingness of his being, and finally restore life to what it is all about: a working hypothesis.
author: Tomislav Sunic

quote: Original Thoughts [10w] Original thoughts are not diminished by days, distance or disregard.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Thoughts are one of the most creative powers we have as human beings. If you hold the mantra in your mind that you are continually becoming more healthful and radiant, that is what you will become.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon,  Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

quote: Anymore, no one's mind is their own.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Lullaby

quote: Mind is a flexible mirror, adjust it, to see a better world.
author: Amit Ray,  Mindfulness : Living in the Moment - Living in the Breath

quote: To learn something new, take the path that you took yesterday.
author: John Burroughs

quote: We must think beyond ourselves
author: Kevin J. Anderson,  A Forest of Stars

quote: New scientific ideas never spring from a communal body, however organized, but rather from the head of an individually inspired researcher who struggles with his problems in lonely thought and unites all his thought on one single point which is his whole world for the moment.
author: Max Planck

quote: You are born with the power to change your life by simply changing your thoughts.
author: Debasish Mridha
